pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Revice (2021, TV show)$(br)Health: 20

Summoned by transforming into $(l:revice/riders/revi)Kamen Rider Revi$(/l)$(br2)Disappears when $(l:revice/riders/revi#ptera)Ptera Genome$(/l), $(l:revice/riders/revi#quetzalcoatlus)Quetzalcoatlus Genome$(/l), $(l:revice/riders/revi#jack_revice)Jack Revice$(/l), $(l:revice/riders/revi#thunder_gale)Thunder Gale$(/l), or $(l:revice/riders/revi#fifty_gale)Fifty Gale$(/l) is used$(br2)Follows the player and aids in combat
